code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./UnicornAvatar.css';var UnicornAvatar=function UnicornAvatar(_ref){var unicorn=_ref.unicorn,deleteUnicorn=_ref.deleteUnicorn,getUnicorns=_ref.getUnicorns;var unicornPic=require('assets/avatars/'+unicorn.avatar+'.jpg');var feedUnicorn=function feedUnicorn(id){var task={name:unicorn.name,avatar:unicorn.avatar,foodLevel:unicorn.foodLevel+50};axios.put("/api/unicorns/".concat(id),task).then(function(res){if(res.data){getUnicorns();}}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};var poopUnicorn=function poopUnicorn(id){var task={name:unicorn.name,avatar:unicorn.avatar,foodLevel:unicorn.foodLevel-20};axios.put("/api/unicorns/".concat(id),task).then(function(res){if(res.data){getUnicorns();}}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("h3",{className:"UnicornAvatar"},unicorn.name),React.createElement("img",{src:unicornPic,alt:"UnicornAvatar",className:"UnicornAvatar"}),React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("button",{className:"UnicornAvatar",onClick:function onClick(){return feedUnicorn(unicorn._id);}},"Feed me!"),React.createElement("button",{className:"UnicornAvatar",onClick:function onClick(){return poopUnicorn(unicorn._id);}},"Poop glitter"),React.createElement("button",{className:"UnicornAvatar",onClick:function onClick(){return deleteUnicorn(unicorn._id);}},"Delete")),React.createElement("p",null,"Food Level: ",unicorn.foodLevel));};export default UnicornAvatar;
